Node.definition: = action by which humans supervise, direct or oversee work (such as building or repairing) or worship (such as singing or playing instruments)
= musical instrument with strings, such as a lute (כִּנֹּור) or lyre (נֵבֶל)
= a type of song (שִׁיר) probably to be accompanied by musical instruments
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= action by which humans or deities speak with a loud voice, often to draw attention to themselves or to their situation and expecting someone to respond in one way or another
= action in which humans or deities respond to a question or situation, either by words or by actions
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth

= pattern of behavior of humans or deities that is in accordance to the requirements of the divine law and generally aimed at establishing or restoring this pattern as a standard, which in certain cases requires a victory over evil and results in prosperity and happiness
= a process by which humans go through extremely difficult circumstances, resulting in severe anxiety, ◄ as if one were confined to a narrow and cramped space from which there is no escape
literally: to enlarge (for someone); hence: = causative action by which humans or deities grant relief to (other) humans by alleviating difficult circumstances

Node.gloss: to be kindly disposed|to be generous|to be merciful|to be gracious|to pity
Node.definition: = state in which humans or deities are favorably disposed to (other) humans, and act accordingly
= action by which humans speak to a deity, often by raising their hands, ► requesting help or expressing their thankfulness
= member of a larger group of related people or objects, ◄ referred to as a child of that larger group
particle linking an event to a point in time; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in time Y

= a reference to an unknown object or event; normally used with the purpose of identifying that object; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that object or event cannot be identified
= position of honor; ◄ often as a result of wealth and/or authority
= state in which humans experience a feeling of shame, as a result of their own actions or because of what other have done
= state in which humans or deities experience a feeling of affection for a person, an object, or a practice
literally: empty; hence: = state in which an event does not serve a useful purpose and is bound to fail
= state in which humans experience the desire to attain a certain status or condition and do what is needed to make this a reality
literally: falsehood; hence: = things that cannot be trusted
= process by which humans or deities acquire information about other humans, deities, or certain facts, which is stored in the mind
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

= someone who practices חֶסֶד, who is committed towards fulfilling his/her obligations; these may be obligations defined within the context of a covenant or agreement, or moral obligations to do well to someone who did well to you before
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= action by which humans or deities speak with a loud voice, often to draw attention to themselves or to their situation and expecting someone to respond in one way or another

Node.gloss: to tremble|to shake|to quake|to be disturbed|to be perturbed|to be excited|to flutter
Node.definition: = process by which humans or objects shake involuntarily; ◄ typically as a result of fear, insecurity, shock, excitement, or other emotions
= action by which a human being commits a wrongful act against God or someone else, whether or not on purpose, ► which may require atonement, restitution, and/or retribution

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
literally: heart; hence: = the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief

Node.gloss: to be silent|to keep silent|to remain silent|to be silenced
Node.definition: = to refrain from speaking

= the human activity of killing one or more animals as a religious sacrifice; usually part of the animal is offered to the deity and part is eaten by the worshipers; often accompanied by the burning of incense

= the human activity of killing one or more animals as a religious sacrifice; usually part of the animal is offered to the deity and part is eaten by the worshipers; often accompanied by the burning of incense

= pattern of behavior of humans or deities that is in accordance to the requirements of the divine law and generally aimed at establishing or restoring this pattern as a standard, which in certain cases requires a victory over evil and results in prosperity and happiness
= state in which humans have confidence in someone or something else and show that by their actions; ≈ usually regarded as negative when the object is human, always positive when the object is YHWH
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= state in which objects or events are numerous in quantity or frequency

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

= a reference to an unknown person or deity; normally used with the purpose of identifying that person or deity; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that person or deity cannot be identified
= causative action by which humans or deities cause humans to perceive something, primarily though not necessarily exclusively with their eyes
= state in which events are well performed, morally and ethically correct, and beneficial to others
literally: to lift up the light (of one's) face (over someone else); hence: = action by which deities show favor to humans ◄ as if the deity causes the light emanating from his face to shine on them

= light as a physical phenomenon, mainly observed during daytime, and the opposite of darkness; ◄ one of God's most important attributes; first created by God and since produced by sun, moon, and stars, but also by fire; ► enables people and animals to see; ≈ associated with life, goodness, happiness, prosperity, security, favor, and wisdom, loved by the righteous, and hated by the wicked
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= state in which humans feel and show great joy
literally: heart; hence: = the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief
= a shorter or longer moment in the passage of time
= seeds of cultivated cereal; ► used as food

= dark red alcoholic liquid; ◄ made out of newly harvested grapes and possibly still at the beginning of the fermentation process; ► used as beverage and for sacrifice; ≈ represents the entire range of agricultural products in Israel, together with grain and oil; associated with joy and well being, and only once with drunkenness and foolishness
= process by which people, objects, and events increase in number or frequency
= state in which multiple events are connected

= state or action by which a human being or animal is in or assumes a horizontal position; ► in order to rest, sleep, or have sex with someone, or because of being unable to stand up as a result of weakness or death; ≈ sometimes associated with security
= state in which humans are asleep; ≈ sometimes associated with security, sometimes with death, sometimes with being inactive
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= referent to a male participant that is addressed in a discourse
= the state of being apart from significant others
= state in which humans live with confidence and without fear; ≈ often regarded as carelessness, especially when there is no mention of trust in YHWH
= causative action by which humans or deities cause (other) humans to make a certain place or area their home
